item.description:
This is an annual event with Big Nazo Lab hosting a showcase of student creations from the RISD Creature-Creation class.  Donation of $5 is recommended.  It is recommended to arrive early, as it is a popular event.  If you can't make Saturday, but still want to see it, there is another showing on Sunday.  Show starts at 8pm, I'll be there early.

From Big Nazo Labs:

Showcase of cutting-edge Creature wierdness and genius
RISD CREATURE-CREATION Show
Rhode Island School of Design Auditorium, South Main Street, Providence
8pm
World Premiere of newly created Creatures from the RISD Creature Creation Class hosted by BIG NAZO LAB in collaboration with musicians and artists from the Providence community

2010 BIG NAZO / RISD Creature Creation Show Highlights

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vZQs-HTMoRw&feature=related
item.how_to_find_us: I'll hang out near the entrance at 7:30 with a meetup sign.
item.why: New creatures created by RISD Students in the Big Nazo lab on display as well as music.
item.name: Big Nazo/RISD Creature-Creation Showcase
